message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $8000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $9000 to make this happen. This is a fantastic opportunity and I'm sure you'll agree once you see the product in action.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we meet in the middle at $8500?
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here, but I can't go any lower than $8800.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we meet at $8200?
Bob,  we're getting closer! I can't go below $8500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's finalize this deal at $8500. I'm confident you'll be very happy with this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $8250?
